name: INSetTaskAttributeIntent
desc: A request to modify the attributes of a task.

items.name: init(targetTask: INTask?, taskTitle: INSpeakableString?, status: INTaskStatus, priority: INTaskPriority, spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?, temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with information about the task and the changes that you want to make.

items.name: var status: INTaskStatus
items.desc: The status to apply to the task.

items.name: enum INTaskStatus
items.desc: Constants indicating the completion state of a task.

items.name: var temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?
items.desc: The time-based trigger to apply to the task.

items.name: var spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?
items.desc: The location-based trigger to apply to the task.
